# lightdash Provider

A Terraform provider for Lightdash

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "lightdash" {
  host  = "https://app.lightdash.cloud"
  token = "xxx-xxx-xxx"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String) Lightdash Host
- `token` (String, Sensitive) Personal access token for Lightdash
